Value: The ConditionalGrangerCausality class computes a pairwise Granger causality test between all signals together.

Param_0: The number of maximum lag with which the autoregressive model will be computed. Default :1.
Param_1: Two choices are possible : 'bic' for Bayesian Information Criterion, or 'aic' for Akaike information criterion. Default : 'bic'
Param_2: if True the plot of correlation function is returned.
